Class SokobanFactory

java.lang.Object
com.aoopproject.games.sokoban.SokobanFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFactory
public class SokobanFactory extends Object implements GameFactory
Concrete factory for creating all necessary components for the Sokoban game. This factory implements the GameFactory interface and is responsible for instantiating the SokobanModel (with a default level), SokobanViewSwing, a generic AbstractGameController, and the KeyboardInputStrategy. It ensures all components are correctly wired together.

  • Method Details

    • createModel

      public AbstractGameModel createModel()
      Creates a SokobanModel instance for Sokoban, initialized with a default level.
      Specified by:
      createModel in interface GameFactory
      Returns:
      A new SokobanModel.

    • createViews

      public List<GameView> createViews(AbstractGameModel model)
      Creates a list of GameViews for Sokoban. Currently, it creates and returns a list containing a single SokobanViewSwing instance.
      Specified by:
      createViews in interface GameFactory
      Parameters:
      model - The AbstractGameModel that the views will observe.
      Returns:
      A list containing the SokobanViewSwing.

    • createController

      public AbstractGameController createController()
      Creates the game controller. For Sokoban, a generic AbstractGameController is currently used as no game-specific controller logic has been identified yet.
      Specified by:
      createController in interface GameFactory
      Returns:
      A new instance of AbstractGameController.

    • createInputStrategy

      public InputStrategy createInputStrategy()
      This method from the GameFactory interface is not directly used by this factory's overridden setupGame() method for creating KeyboardInputStrategy, as that strategy requires a controller instance which is handled within setupGame.
      Specified by:
      createInputStrategy in interface GameFactory
      Returns:
      This implementation throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

    • setupGame

      public AbstractGameController setupGame()
      Sets up the complete Sokoban game application with a Swing UI and KeyboardInputStrategy. This method orchestrates the creation of the model, controller, views, and input strategy, and wires them together, including initializing the strategy with the correct view component.
      Specified by:
      setupGame in interface GameFactory
      Returns:
      A fully configured AbstractGameController ready to start Sokoban, or null if the game setup was aborted.
